We are solving Employability at Scale for the VUCA world! The unique learning model that we conceptualized in 2009 and executed for the next few years demonstrated significant “behavior shift” in learners within a short span of time! Learners came out more mature and holistic and were always learning! This solved the problem but was not scalable as there was a huge reliance on “super human trainers/facilitators”!
This world is a beautiful place.
